subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Stoudemire, who had the remainder of his five-year contract with the Knicks bought out on Sunday, was in Dallas on Monday working on the deal, according to a person with knowledge of the situation.
snippet: Stoudemire, who had the remainder of his five-year contract with the Knicks bought out on Sunday, was in Dallas on Monday working on the deal, according to a person with knowledge of the situation.
